name: Ride the Bear: You Are Holding a Computer Mouse and I Am Soaring Above

metadata.name: Ride the Bear: 1
metadata.description: Ride the Bear is a generative art collection by mindrash. The pieces evoke the blood, sweat, and tears in this bear market. Chaos expands beyond the framework. The color palette is derived from Red Bull demonstrating the speed and energy of the space. You are holding a computer mouse and I am soaring above.
